file_content.text: You have the gratitude of both House Organa and House Panteer.
You see, Orrick, all is well. The evidence has been secured from Castle Panteer.
It seems so. I... I am pleased we will be able to prosecute the scoundrel who killed our beloved heir. Thank you, friend.
Today, an egregious wrong has been righted. House Organa is grateful to you. And I am grateful, as well.
Took little effort.
Then you are a great asset to our cause. And a true hero.
I enjoyed it.
I enjoyed it.
The attitude of a true hero.
You've definitively earned House Organa's generous reward.
I've never come to the aid of a more beautiful woman.
[Flirt] Anything for you.
I don't normally blush this easily.
Where's the reward?
Of course, of course. House Organa takes great pride in being generous.
You've done much to help forward an alliance between House Organa and House Panteer. Good day to you, friend.
I believe in you, friend. I know you will succeed in acquiring the evidence from Castle Panteer.
You see, Orrick, House Organa brings with it some impressive allies.
Hmm. I suppose so. There is an obvious air of accomplishment. Fine... stranger, come here--
Please, Orrick, where are your manners?
Friend, I am Samara Organa, special ambassador to House Panteer. This is Orrick Gwyndon, captain of the Panteer Queensguard. A word with you, if you will.
Of course. I have deep respect for House Organa.
Well met, friends.
Go on, Samara.
Thank you. I truly appreciate your time and attention. Don't you agree, Orrick?
[Flirt] Just one word?
My. Now you've made me blush. You could learn quite a lot from this one, Orrick.
You two finished your bickering?
Is the family squabble over?
Orrick and I were not fighting. We are fast becoming friends, in fact. Isn't that right, Orrick?
Yes. Of course. Let me get to the heart of it, then.
It was the cowardly murder of Prince Gaul Panteer, heir to the throne, that plunged Alderaan into chaos. Now, after many years, his suspected murderer has resurfaced.
My house seeks evidence to prove the culprit's guilt--and show that House Ulgo paid him.
A strong blow against House Ulgo.
That could help end this war.
We are of one mind, then.
Consider me intrigued.
What's required?
Allow me to augment.
House Organa has pledged to help our Panteer brothers capture and try this criminal.
Unfortunately, the evidence we seek is locked away in Castle Panteer, now in Ulgo hands. We need someone to liberate it.
Securing the evidence needed to try this foul murderer is a task worthy of a Jedi.
Sounds worthwhile.
Brave Jedi, you are a symbol of hope for us all.
Liberating is what I do best... next to blowing things up.
My kind of operation.
Organa dreams of a day when soldiers are no longer necessary. But for now, your talents are essential.
I'm paid very well to smuggle things, into or out of dangerous places.
That's what I do best.
I'm grateful for your talents. And if it's payment you seek, you will not be disappointed.
If the Panteer guard here can't handle it, I'll be happy to save the day.
Orrick isn't man enough, huh?
Bite your tongue! The Queensguard must defend the royal bloodline, always. No matter where we might wish to be.
This could change the entire shape of the war. May the Force be with you.
I liberate people, not paperwork.
Look elsewhere. [Refuse quest]
Wandering into an enemy keep to get some paperwork isn't my idea of smart, sister.
Forget it. [Refuse quest]
Call me when you need someone to go get the murderer.
Another time. [Refuse quest]
You need a clerk, not a Jedi.
Sorry. [Refuse quest]
I'm not impressed, Organa.
House Organa is dedicated to returning House Panteer to prominence.
